name: Dragon Bros
description: Robots are everywhere, destroying the place you used to call home! The only cure for this terrible mess is to wipe out those cranky machines with bullets and big explosions! Play as a young dragon in this 2D retro run & gun adventure in co-op or solo. Free your Dragon-mom from the evil Mechaliches!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo 8335 or AMD Phenom 875 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon 7700 HD or Nvidia GTX 750 or GT 9800 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 550 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo 8335 or AMD Phenom 875 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon 7700 HD or Nvidia GTX 750 or GT 9800 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 550 MB available space
